description:
沪江英乐：R&B天后 Toni Braxton 强强联手R&B天王 Babyface 爆赞新单《Hurt You》！作为90年代风靡美国乐坛的风云人物居然现在合作了，不可思议，真是除了好听还是好听！

【R&B天后天王联手新单《Hurt You》】

歌词：

(Verse)
Here we go
Damn, here we go again
Loving you has caused me so much pain
But you don’t see it
You never see it

Well I apologize
I was just doing what I can do baby
An eye for an eye

(Chorus)
God knows I never meant to hurt you
I never meant to break your heart
Your heart, baby
God knows I never meant to tell you, tell you
Now let the day come back for it
Back for it, baby
God knows I never meant to hurt you
Hurt you, hurt you, hurt you, hurt you

(Verse)
Maybe, your tears is rough just I’m not gon lie, baby
I did you wrong so many times, yes
So I know why you crossed the line
But oh girl, never dream you’d cheat on me

Well I, I apologize
I pray that you forgive me
If you wanna get to it, ‘cause I did made you cry

(Chorus)
God knows I never meant to hurt you
I never meant to break your heart
Your heart, baby
God knows I never meant to tell you, tell you
Now let the day come back for it
Back for it, baby
God knows I never meant to hurt you
I never meant to break your heart
Your heart, baby
God knows I never meant to tell you, tell you
Now let the day come back for it
Back for it, baby
God knows I never meant to hurt you
Hurt you, hurt you, hurt you, hurt you

(Bridge)
Can we start over again?
Can we start going as friends?
Give me one more try
A tender kiss is your gift to me
Oh I’d give the only thing that I’d ever need

God knows I never meant to hurt you
I never meant to break your heart
I never meant to take, take things too far

God knows I never meant to hurt you
I never meant to break your heart
God knows I never meant to tell you, tell you
Now let the day come back for it
I never meant to take, take things too far
God knows I never meant to hurt you
I never meant to break you, break your heart
I never meant to take, take things too far
